title: boAt Rockerz 400
description: Bluetooth On Ear Headphones(Grey/Green). 40mm driver. 8 hours playtime. The easy access integrated controls with built-in mic offers a smooth user experience and hands-free communication on the go. Stay connected to your sound via not one but two modes: Bluetooth as well as AUX. 1 year warranty from the date of purchase

title: JBL Tune 760NC
description: Wireless Over Ear Active Noise Cancellation Headphones. Active noise cancellation. These Bluetooth headphones reproduce that same JBL sound, punching out bass that’s both deep and powerful. Listen wirelessly for up to 35 hours with Active Noise Cancellation or up to 50 hours without Noise Cancellation for long-lasting fun. Recharge the battery quickly in 2 hours or enjoy endlessly in wired mode using the detachable AUX cable provided.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry Leading noise cancellation-two processors control 8 microphones for unprecedented noise cancellation. With Auto NC Optimizer, noise cancelling is automatically optimized based on your wearing conditions and environment.Magnificent Sound, engineered to perfection with the new Integrated Processor V1.Up to 30-hour battery life with quick charging (3 min charge for 3 hours of playback)

title: Bose Noise Cancelling 700
description: Bluetooth Wireless Over Ear Headphones. Optimized for Amazon Alexa and the Google Assistant, access your voice assistant with a simple button press. Personalize your environment with 11 levels of noise cancelling - control distractions or let ambient sound in.Get up to 20 hours of wireless battery life and time-based power information.

title: Skullcandy Hesh EVO
description: Over Ear True Black. Simple, intuitive buttons let you take calls, adjust volume and change tracks without ever touching your phone. Hesh Evo features built-in Tile finding technology. If you ever misplace your headphones, you can easily âringâ them from the Tile App. So what might have seemed lost, is now quickly found.

title: Boult Audio ProBass Ranger
description: Over-Ear Wireless. Boult’s sound signature has been packed with extra punchy and deep bass with accentuates the warm midst and crystal clear sparky highs. Transmission Distance 20m. Driver Size 50 mm.The run time is 13 hours and it has 1-2 days of standby.Designed for flexibility, Boult Audio headphones comes with a quality Aux-cable to ensure uninterrupted playing even when you run out of battery.

title: UNIGEN Quietbeats
description: Active Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones. Professional protein ear pads, 45°/90° swivelling ear cups and adjustable headband deliver better durability and comfort. Lightweight design reduces pressure on ears and make it comfortable for all-day wearing. Bluetooth 5.0 technology and ensures stable connection of upto 10m/33ft. 600mAh battery provides 10hrs of uninterrupted audio when ANC mode is on and 20hrs of music with ANC mode off. While listening on only AUX mode you can enjoy playtime of upto 30hrs.

title: ZEBRONICS Zeb-Thunder
description: Wireless Bluetooth Over The Ear Headphone. Dust your headband to your comfortable best while you work or listen to music. 9hrs* Playback Time: Fall in love with the audio experience with 9* hours of playback time to keep you going.Be spoilt for choice with multi-connectivity options like like BT, 3.5mm AUX input, FM and MicroSD card.

title: HAMMER Bash
description: Over The Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones. Go wireless to wired in a few seconds with Hammer headphones as it supports aux connectivity along with the Bluetooth connectivity.Bash headphones are ergonomically designed to give long hours of listening comfort. Spend a whole day listening to music with the soft PU cushioning of this Bluetooth headset. Bash’s portable & foldable design makes it easy to carry around.

title: Infinity JBL Glide 510
description: Quick Charge, Wireless On Ear Headphone. 72 Hours Playtime Under Optimum Audio Settings.Dual Equalizer Modes for Normal & Deep Bass Output. Driver Sensitivity (1KHz / 1mW) 102±3dB. Audio Specifications: Impedence(ohms) 32 ohms.

title: Iphone 14 Pro
description: 15.54 cm (6.1-inch) Super Retina XDR display featuring Always-On and ProMotion.48MP Main camera for up to 4x greater resolution.Unlocked for All Carriers.

title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra

It's an epic leap for smartphone technology.The Dynamic AMOLED 2x display improves outdoor visibility with up to 1750 nits in peak brightness.* And the 120Hz adaptive refresh rate keeps the scroll smooth, adjusting to what's on screen for an optimized view.

title: Google Pixel 7 Pro
description: The Pixel 7 Pro triple rear camera system includes a 5x telephoto lens.The updated ultrawide lens with autofocus now powers Macro Focus.The Pixel 7 Pro has a 30x Super Res Zoom for high-quality photos from far away.

title: Xiaomi 13 Pro
description: The 6.73 inch 2K 120Hz E6 AMOLED display with a peak brightness of 1900nits meets the most demanding needs and provides the best viewing experience. title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4
description: The Galaxy Z Fold4 does a lot in one hand with its 15.73 cm(6.2-inch) Cover Screen. Unfolded, the 19.21 cm(7.6-inch) Main Screen lets you really get into the zone.
